    P. Padaikathan

    Senior Scientific Officer
    A-107, Department of Materials Engineering
    Indian Institute of Science
    Bangalore-560012, INDIA

    Tel: +91-80-2293 2677
    email: padai_at_iisc.ac.in

    Education

    Ph.D (2016), IISc, Bangalore
    M.Sc.(Engg.) (2005), Bangalore
    AMIIM (1995), IIM, Kolkatta

    Research Interests

    The Science of Crystallization-Rapid solidification
    Electron Microscopy
    Mechanical behavior of materials
    Alloys Design and Development

    Most cited Research Articles and other details

    3. Effects of processing conditions on Solidification Characteristics and Mechanical properties of in-situ Magnesium metal matrix composites derived from polysilazane precursor
      Nagaraj M Chellaiah, Padaikathan Pambannan and M K Surappa
      Journal of Composite Materials 53 (26-27), 3741-3755 (2019)
